channel.title: Adding customs?
channel.description: how do i add customs to my server, example: dragon claws, statius...etc...

I wouldn’t be learning anything if it is all done for me, now would I? If i was to do it, the chances of me learning and retaining it are a lot larger.

item.title: Adding customs?
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:2, topic:333670”]Get the ints, post in client.java(client sided)
Take the models, put in model folder(client sided)
compile
Log into game, do add model (number), or if you have a client where it says “addmodels” at top.
Then you spawn the item, if its a diff item, log out, compile again, then log back in ( close the client) should work.[/quote]
first-don’t know the ints or how to get them
second-there is no model folder in client side
third-there is no add model command for my server/client
forth-i have already read all the tutorials on ints and don’t understand so don’t tell me to read any tuts.
fifth-i don’t know how to add a “add model” command.
sixth-well, this server/client has pretty much nothing so i have to start from nothing and seeing as how i have like no experience in coding RSPS’s, i can’t figure anything out what so ever. i have been to the java site and read all the tutorials, but i have no idea how to link all that shit with a RSPS…and so on, so forth. get it?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding customs?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Get the ints, post in client.java(client sided)
Take the models, put in model folder(client sided)
compile
Log into game, do add model (number), or if you have a client where it says “addmodels” at top.
Then you spawn the item, if its a diff item, log out, compile again, then log back in ( close the client) should work.

Read full topic
